Class com.heaton.bot.URLUtility 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class com.heaton.bot.URLUtility 

Object
   |
   +----com.heaton.bot.URLUtility
public class URLUtility
extends Object
This simple static class contains several methods that are useful to manipulate URL's.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton

base64Encode(String)
Encodes a string in base64.
resolveBase(String, String)
Resolve the base of a URL.
stripAnhcor(URL)
Strip the anchor tag from the URL.
stripQuery(URL)
Strip the query string from a URL.

base64Encode 
public static java.lang.String base64Encode(String s)
Encodes a string in base64.

Parameters:
s - The string to encode.
Returns:
The encoded string.
resolveBase 
public static java.lang.String resolveBase(String base,
                                           String rel)
Resolve the base of a URL.

Parameters:
base - The base.
rel - The relative path.
Returns:
The combined absolute URL.
stripAnhcor 
public static java.net.URL stripAnhcor(URL url) throws MalformedURLException
Strip the anchor tag from the URL.

Parameters:
url - The URL to scan.
Returns:
The URL with no anchor tag.
Throws: MalformedURLException
stripQuery 
public static java.net.URL stripQuery(URL url) throws MalformedURLException
Strip the query string from a URL.

Parameters:
url - The URL to examine.
Returns:
The URL with no query string.
Throws: MalformedURLException
